Academic Excellence

Quality education integrating formal academics with Islamic teachings

Our Academic Programs

Formal Education

Our academic program follows the Ethiopian national curriculum with qualified teachers holding degrees and diplomas in their respective fields.

  • Primary and secondary education
  • Qualified teaching staff (41 teachers)
  • National exam preparation
  • Remedial classes for struggling students

Islamic Studies

Daily Qur'an memorization and Islamic moral education integrated with formal academics.

  • 14 dedicated Qur'an teachers
  • Morning and evening sessions
  • Ethical and spiritual development
  • Integrated with formal curriculum

Boarding Program

Full residential services that provide a stable learning environment for pastoralist children.

  • Safe accommodation
  • Nutritious meals
  • 24/7 supervision
  • Spiritual guidance

Teaching Staff Information

Qualified and Dedicated Educators

Our team of 55 teaching staff members provide quality education to pastoralist children
